# octahedron
#
g Object001

v  1  0  0
v  0  -1  0
v  -1  0  0
v  0  1  0
v  0  0  1
v  0  0  -1

f  2  1  5
f  3  2  5
f  4  3  5
f  1  4  5
f  1  2  6
f  2  3  6
f  3  4  6
f  4  1  6

# tetrahedron.obj created by hand.
#
 
g tetrahedron
 
v 1.00 1.00 1.00
v 2.00 1.00 1.00
v 1.00 2.00 1.00
v 1.00 1.00 2.00
 
f 1 3 2
f 1 4 3
f 1 2 4
f 2 3 4

# unitplane.obj

g unitplane

v -0.500000 0.000000 -0.500000
v -0.500000 0.000000 0.500000
v 0.500000 0.000000 -0.500000
v 0.500000 0.000000 0.500000

vn 0.000000 1.000000 0.000000

f 1//1 3//1 4//1
f 1//1 4//1 2//1


# unitcube.obj

g unitcube

v  -0.5  -0.5  -0.5
v  -0.5  -0.5  0.5
v  -0.5  0.5  -0.5
v  -0.5  0.5  0.5
v  0.5  -0.5  -0.5
v  0.5  -0.5  0.5
v  0.5  0.5  -0.5
v  0.5  0.5  0.5

vn  0.0  0.0  1.0
vn  0.0  0.0 -1.0
vn  0.0  1.0  0.0
vn  0.0 -1.0  0.0
vn  1.0  0.0  0.0
vn -1.0  0.0  0.0

f  1//2  7//2  5//2
f  1//2  3//2  7//2
f  1//6  4//6  3//6
f  1//6  2//6  4//6

g icosahedron
